name: TheArcadeStation
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the arcade station
des:
24/7 music station of 60, 70s, 80s pop, rock, soul, glam, funk, disco, progressive rock, electronic, post punk, new wave, metal, and rap. 
Every Tuesday at 7pm EDT/EST, an hour long all genres live show is dedicated to the music of the 1970s.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
